mapper.sql: t.id as id, t.create_date as create_date, DATE_FORMAT(t.create_date,'%Y-%m-%d') as create_date_str, t.goods_name as goods_name, t.qty as qty, t.price as price, t.status as status, t.income_rate as income_rate, t.divided_rate as divided_rate, t.payment as payment, t.effect_estimate as effect_estimate, t.set_amount as set_amount, t.income_estimate as income_estimate, t.commission_rate as commission_rate, t.subsidy_amount as subsidy_amount, t.order_no as order_no, t.media_id as media_id, t.media_name as media_name, t.adsense_id as adsense_id, t.adsense_name as adsense_name, t.import_date as import_date, t.import_by as import_by, t.commission_amount as commission_amount
mapper.insert: insert into tt_order (create_date, goods_name, qty, price, status, income_rate, divided_rate, payment, effect_estimate, set_amount, income_estimate, commission_rate, subsidy_amount, order_no, media_id, media_name, adsense_id, adsense_name, import_date, import_by,commission_amount) values (#{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{goodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qty,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{price,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{incomeRate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dividedRate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payment,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{effectEstimate,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{setAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{incomeEstimate,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{commissionRate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subsidyAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mediaId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mediaName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{adsenseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{adsenseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{importDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{importBy,jdbcType=BIGINT},#{commissionAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE})
mapper.select:
select
from tt_order t
order by ${map.orderByClause}
order by t.id DESC
mapper.update: update tt_order set create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, goods_name = #{goodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, qty = #{qty,jdbcType=INTEGER}, price = #{price,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, income_rate = #{incomeRate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, divided_rate = #{dividedRate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, payment = #{payment,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, effect_estimate = #{effectEstimate,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, set_amount = #{setAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, income_estimate = #{incomeEstimate,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, commission_rate = #{commissionRate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, subsidy_amount = #{subsidyAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, order_no = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, media_id = #{mediaId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, media_name = #{mediaName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, adsense_id = #{adsenseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, adsense_name = #{adsenseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, import_date = #{importDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, import_by = #{importBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, commission_amount = #{commissionAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
